definition: think again and again before acting (idiom); consider carefully in advance
surname San
three/3
to think/to consider

sentences.english: Think twice even when there is only one negative reference.
sentences.chinese: 即便只有一個負面的意見，你也要三思而後行。
但他們需要三思而後行。

sentences.english: "Look before you leap"is a warning against people acting rashly.
sentences.chinese: “三思而後行”這條諺語是告誡人們不要魯莽行事。

sentences.english: The moral of the story is “Look before you leap.”
sentences.chinese: 這故事的寓意是“三思而後行”。

sentences.english: Anyways, you have to think twice before you act.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，你要三思而後行。

definition: Trouble issues from the mouth (idiom). A loose tongue may cause a lot of trouble.
